attributes.action: Reintroduction of the minimum living standard for housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It could be seen that many of the empty new builds are only occupided due to the lack of housing in the country; a home wether rent or owned is essential to living and can be seen being exploited by developers in which housing which does not have adequte sound proofing or space to live in leads to possible conflict between neighbours along with other issues.  Minimuum living standards should be reintroduced and include new issues such as energy efficiancy.
